name: Victory guns - The last frontier
description:
Hello, guys!

Meet the Victory guns - The last frontier game! Here you can become a real artilleryman and try to prevent enemies to reach your base!

Choose a GUN and defend your base! Destroy enemies, earn coins and gems and buy new cool guns. Use power-UPS to beat all the records. Fight various ENEMIES and if you are a master, challenge the BOSS and defeat the BOSS’S WAVE.

Want to become the coolest gunner and conquer the world of guns? Reload! Aim! FIRE! 

CHARACTERISTIC

- A variety of guns with different abilities

- Exciting gameplay

- Different enemy units and 20+ different boss’s waves

- Convenient interface

 

IN THE NEXT UPDATES

- New boss waves

- New enemy units

- New guns with some interesting, new features

- Ability to select LOCATIONS and 3 new locations
